TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 748
TEI.2.document_title: Josiah H. Bell to Stephen F. Austin, 02-20-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 748

div1.p: Received one hundred pounds of salt on an order drawn by Stephen F Austin on Saml. Carter in my favour, bearing date the 20th of Feby 1824 said order being drawn for one hundred and nineteen pounds
